TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Pa-si-li-ya, title = Pa-si-li-ya, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pa-si-li-ya} }

S.FORM: == Pa-si-li-ya 巴西利亞 == Pa-si-li-ya "Pu-taw-ya a kamu: Brasília (bɾa'ziljɐ)", u kamuac Pa-si-li-ya. u Pa-si a tukay, itida i talakaw nu buyu' caycaylimwal a pa-si buyuan, u Lin-he-kuo-ciw-ke kapulungan nu kitaki kahetikan nu babalak. Pa-si-li-ya u kitakid nu satabakiay tusep a se-ci nu nikadanay nisangaan a tukay. 巴西利亞(葡萄牙語:Brasília (bɾa'ziljɐ)), . amica tu lingatu limwan ku tademaw a nipisikian tu kanadtal a cen-ce tatelungan, nika katukuh tu tusepcaysiw mihcaan, tademaw nu Pa-si-li-ya milakuuyt tu 3,000,000 ku tademaw,mapataayaw tu sakatulu nu Pa-si a tukayan, La-men a sakalima nu tukay, pulung nu sakaudip sakatulu nu Pa-si, La-men sakalima, i La-men tukayan a tademaw nu pulung a sakasilaculan nu sakaudip u satalakaway, nu 25,500 kalisiw nu amuhaun. ,為25,500美元. patideng tina tukayan nu Pa-si-li-ya i caysiwlimnum katukuh caysiwlimsep, u baluhay a niyadu'an, mikiyaku tu tukay a wayway tu nipatideng, namahida saicelang sa ku balucu' a misiki tina papatidengan atu amelik macunus ku tademaw a nikasinganganan, caysiwnumsep mihcaan sepat a bulad tucay demiad, mangalay pakaamelik ku Pa-si tu nikalahatan, u tawyaay nu tukay Li-ye-ze-ne-lu mabulaw taydan i Pa-si-li-ya. . kiyaku tu tukay 規劃城市 Pa-si-li-ya miida tu kiyaku nu tukay atu kiyaku a nipahetikan nu babalaki a nikatengilan, sakamu satu " caysiwlimnem mihcaan Pa-si-li-ya papatidengan u Pa-si a tatelungan, cinida han tu nisikian a sakahemekan. mikiyakuay tu tukay a tademaw ci Lu-si-aw.Ke-se-ta atu ci Aw-se-ka.Ni-may-ye u misikiay tu tukay a tademaw, namaka niyadu'an atu sin-cen kitidaan a nipisangaan katukuh tu nipatideng tu lumaan a nikasilacan, Pa-si-li-ya sakamusa mahida u wayway nu ayam. mahida patahekalay namakatukay a sungaay a nabalucuan a nisikian, duma satu nisangaan tu luma' nu sihu sakahemekan nu nabalucuan sa." ." likisi 歷史 saan i likisi Pa-si naitida i Sa-e-wa-tuo atu Li-yu-ze-ne-lu tusa a sadipasay nu tukay a malatukay. caysiwlimnem mihcaan Pa-si cung-tun ci Zu-say-li-nuo. Ku-pi-ci-ke sakamusa a patideng tu Pa-si-li-ya. maminsangan mikiyaku tu tukay a tademaw ci Lu-si-aw. Ke-se-ta "Lúcio Costa", macimacian a nikapulungan a nisangaan u misangaay a tademaw ci Aw-se-ka. Ni-may-ye " pasu satalakaway a pikaygian, cung-tun-hu, satalakaway a huing, sakay hekalan pu, se-hua-pu, luma nu cung-tun, tabakiay a kiukay", misikiay tu sakay hekalan ci Roberto Burle Marx. tukay a nipisikian u nidatengan ni Ke-pi ku sapalekal. nipatidengan nu Pa-si-li-ya namaka caysiwlimnem mihcaan , katukau i caysiwnemsep mihcaan a mahedek, sipcay a buladan a mahedek. sipakay pabaw a miadih mahida u hikuki atu adipapang ku wayway adihan. ninatukay pangangan han u Lin-pang tukay, nu madayumay a nakamuan han u " BSB". (Lúcio Costa), Roberto Burle Marx. ",或簡稱"BSB". kitidaan 地理 pa-si-li-ya kitidaan nu timulan 15°45 "15.75°", nutipan 47°57 "47.95°", itida i sakalecad nu talakawan ceysepsepsep a Pa-si teban nu Ke-ya-se-cuo nu buyuan, Ma-la-ni-ni-wung sauwac atu Wi-e-de sauwac nu kalalitemuah a masangkakuay nu kitidaan. caysiwwalpic mihcaan caytu bulad pitu a demiad, Lin-he-kuo ciaw-ke-wen-cu mihapu pa-si-li-ya u liwan nu babalaki a lalangawan nu kitakidan. 60 caysiwnumsep mihcaan mikilul tu Lan-pang-cen-hu ce-li-ye-ze-nia-lu mabulaw taydan i Pa-si-li-yu a kun-mu-ing, u nuheni atu iluc itida namin nu macian a sikusia mueneng, nuayawan nu "Paranoa" a banaw nu ayawan a "Lago Sul" u nucanan a kanatalan itida i Pa-si nu tapang a kitidaan atu tapang nu hekal a sikusia mueneng. tawya patidengay tinabaluhay nu mikuliay a tademaw atu iluc itida namin mueneng i Wi-sin-cen, idaw ku limaay nu Wi-sin-cen malakuuy tu caywang nu tademawan, satabakiay nu Wi-sin-cen u Taguatinga. duma hantu , idaw ku dumaay a tademaw itida i milawaay tu Pa-si-li-ya a "Goiás" niyaduan,pasu "Agua Clara". 1960 ,Paranoa湖對岸的Lago Sul Taguatinga. Goiás州城鎮,如Agua Clara. siki 設計 Ke-se-ta u Pa-si-li-ya kakapah ku nipikiyaku, nipatuduan tu kitidaan nu paylumaluma' atu sasiwbayan a nikakenihan, a caay patideng tu kakulian a kitidaan, atu u canan nu sasangaan tu luma' aycuwa hakiya paluma' atu talakaw nu nisangaan tu luma'an. ci Ke-se-ta pacici i Pa-si-li-ya nu hekalan tatenga mahida u adipapang, nika hatidaay tu nu tademaw mahida u hikuki sa. "hikuki" a "udip" u sihu kuyda, kuo-hua atu duma nu sihuan nu pulung a papatidengan tu luma', idaw ku nisikian ni Ni-may ku sakay cilacilaan a kiwkay. i macimacian idaw ku talakaway nu tilibian, i pabaw han maadih nu mita ku nabakuan atu banaw nu waywayan. "sakubat" pangangan han timul atu amis nu sakubatan, tanayu' makaala tu pitu a kunlian. ,各約7公里長. cacay nu ahebalay a kaw-su' dadan militin tu timul amis nu sakubatan, teban milawit tu teban nu pangiluan nu basu, itida han u gingku atu tatayda mukan tu pahan a patiyamay. tepal nu tabakiay a dadan yudah ku lumaluma'an, u siwbay ku mikenihay, langdaway atu kilakilangan sakaydihan sa. micapi tu pahikukian idaw ku aadupan nu aidangan. Ta-se-kun, kan-le-hua kapahay nu luma'an itida i tepal nu banaw, idaw ku cacay micidekay a aaidangan. . sakaudip 經濟 saan ku mese sasapalitaan a sakaudip u satekesay nu macian, tusepcaytu mihcaan Pa-si-li-ya u sakay kitakidan u saka siplim nu satekesay a tukayan, mahida u tusepcaysep mihcaan u saka pitu a bataan nu kitidaan , itini i Sen-paw-luo han sabaw tusa atu Li-ye-ze'-nei-lu saka sabaw tulu. (第13)之後. #%E5%9C%B0%E7%90%86

== Pa-si-li-ya 巴西利亞 == Pa-si-li-ya "Po-taw-ya a kamo: Brasília (bɾa'ziljɐ)", o kamoac Pa-si-li-ya. o Pa-si a tokay, itida i talakaw no boyo' caycaylimwal a pa-si boyoan, o Lin-he-koo-ciw-ke kapolongan no kitaki kahetikan no babalak. Pa-si-li-ya o kitakid no satabakiay tosep a se-ci no nikadanay nisangaan a tokay. 巴西利亞(葡萄牙語:Brasília (bɾa'ziljɐ)), . amica to lingato limwan ko tademaw a nipisikian to kanadtal a cen-ce tatelongan, nika katokoh to tosepcaysiw mihcaan, tademaw no Pa-si-li-ya milakooyt to 3,000,000 ko tademaw,mapataayaw to sakatolo no Pa-si a tokayan, La-men a sakalima no tokay, polong no sakaodip sakatolo no Pa-si, La-men sakalima, i La-men tokayan a tademaw no polong a sakasilacolan no sakaodip o satalakaway, no 25,500 kalisiw no amohaon. ,為25,500美元. patideng tina tokayan no Pa-si-li-ya i caysiwlimnom katokoh caysiwlimsep, o balohay a niyado'an, mikiyako to tokay a wayway to nipatideng, namahida saicelang sa ko baloco' a misiki tina papatidengan ato amelik maconos ko tademaw a nikasinganganan, caysiwnomsep mihcaan sepat a bolad tocay demiad, mangalay pakaamelik ko Pa-si to nikalahatan, o tawyaay no tokay Li-ye-ze-ne-lo mabolaw taydan i Pa-si-li-ya. . kiyako to tokay 規劃城市 Pa-si-li-ya miida to kiyako no tokay ato kiyako a nipahetikan no babalaki a nikatengilan, sakamo sato " caysiwlimnem mihcaan Pa-si-li-ya papatidengan o Pa-si a tatelongan, cinida han to nisikian a sakahemekan. mikiyakoay to tokay a tademaw ci Lo-si-aw.Ke-se-ta ato ci Aw-se-ka.Ni-may-ye o misikiay to tokay a tademaw, namaka niyado'an ato sin-cen kitidaan a nipisangaan katokoh to nipatideng to lomaan a nikasilacan, Pa-si-li-ya sakamosa mahida o wayway no ayam. mahida patahekalay namakatokay a songaay a nabalocoan a nisikian, doma sato nisangaan to loma' no siho sakahemekan no nabalocoan sa." ." likisi 歷史 saan i likisi Pa-si naitida i Sa-e-wa-too ato Li-yo-ze-ne-lo tosa a sadipasay no tokay a malatokay. caysiwlimnem mihcaan Pa-si cong-ton ci Zo-say-li-noo. Ko-pi-ci-ke sakamosa a patideng to Pa-si-li-ya. maminsangan mikiyako to tokay a tademaw ci Lo-si-aw. Ke-se-ta "Lúcio Costa", macimacian a nikapolongan a nisangaan o misangaay a tademaw ci Aw-se-ka. Ni-may-ye " paso satalakaway a pikaygian, cong-ton-ho, satalakaway a hoing, sakay hekalan po, se-hoa-po, loma no cong-ton, tabakiay a kiokay", misikiay to sakay hekalan ci Roberto Borle Marx. tokay a nipisikian o nidatengan ni Ke-pi ko sapalekal. nipatidengan no Pa-si-li-ya namaka caysiwlimnem mihcaan , katokao i caysiwnemsep mihcaan a mahedek, sipcay a boladan a mahedek. sipakay pabaw a miadih mahida o hikoki ato adipapang ko wayway adihan. ninatokay pangangan han o Lin-pang tokay, no madayomay a nakamoan han o " BSB". (Lúcio Costa), Roberto Borle Marx. ",或簡稱"BSB". kitidaan 地理 pa-si-li-ya kitidaan no timolan 15°45 "15.75°", notipan 47°57 "47.95°", itida i sakalecad no talakawan ceysepsepsep a Pa-si teban no Ke-ya-se-coo no boyoan, Ma-la-ni-ni-wong saowac ato Wi-e-de saowac no kalalitemoah a masangkakoay no kitidaan. caysiwwalpic mihcaan cayto bolad pito a demiad, Lin-he-koo ciaw-ke-wen-co mihapo pa-si-li-ya o liwan no babalaki a lalangawan no kitakidan. 60 caysiwnomsep mihcaan mikilol to Lan-pang-cen-ho ce-li-ye-ze-nia-lo mabolaw taydan i Pa-si-li-yo a kon-mo-ing, o noheni ato iloc itida namin no macian a sikosia moeneng, noayawan no "Paranoa" a banaw no ayawan a "Lago Sol" o nocanan a kanatalan itida i Pa-si no tapang a kitidaan ato tapang no hekal a sikosia moeneng. tawya patidengay tinabalohay no mikoliay a tademaw ato iloc itida namin moeneng i Wi-sin-cen, idaw ko limaay no Wi-sin-cen malakooy to caywang no tademawan, satabakiay no Wi-sin-cen o Tagoatinga. doma hanto , idaw ko domaay a tademaw itida i milawaay to Pa-si-li-ya a "Goiás" niyadoan,paso "Agoa Clara". 1960 ,Paranoa湖對岸的Lago Sol Tagoatinga. Goiás州城鎮,如Agoa Clara. siki 設計 Ke-se-ta o Pa-si-li-ya kakapah ko nipikiyako, nipatodoan to kitidaan no paylomaloma' ato sasiwbayan a nikakenihan, a caay patideng to kakolian a kitidaan, ato o canan no sasangaan to loma' aycowa hakiya paloma' ato talakaw no nisangaan to loma'an. ci Ke-se-ta pacici i Pa-si-li-ya no hekalan tatenga mahida o adipapang, nika hatidaay to no tademaw mahida o hikoki sa. "hikoki" a "odip" o siho koyda, koo-hoa ato doma no sihoan no polong a papatidengan to loma', idaw ko nisikian ni Ni-may ko sakay cilacilaan a kiwkay. i macimacian idaw ko talakaway no tilibian, i pabaw han maadih no mita ko nabakoan ato banaw no waywayan. "sakobat" pangangan han timol ato amis no sakobatan, tanayo' makaala to pito a konlian. ,各約7公里長. cacay no ahebalay a kaw-so' dadan militin to timol amis no sakobatan, teban milawit to teban no pangiloan no baso, itida han o gingko ato tatayda mokan to pahan a patiyamay. tepal no tabakiay a dadan yodah ko lomaloma'an, o siwbay ko mikenihay, langdaway ato kilakilangan sakaydihan sa. micapi to pahikokian idaw ko aadopan no aidangan. Ta-se-kon, kan-le-hoa kapahay no loma'an itida i tepal no banaw, idaw ko cacay micidekay a aaidangan. . sakaodip 經濟 saan ko mese sasapalitaan a sakaodip o satekesay no macian, tosepcayto mihcaan Pa-si-li-ya o sakay kitakidan o saka siplim no satekesay a tokayan, mahida o tosepcaysep mihcaan o saka pito a bataan no kitidaan , itini i Sen-paw-loo han sabaw tosa ato Li-ye-ze'-nei-lo saka sabaw tolo. (第13)之後. #%E5%9C%B0%E7%90%86
